text: Potom ozhestochilis' serdtsa vashi posle etogo: oni tochno kamen' ili yeshche boleye zhestokiye. Da! I sredi kamney yest' takiye, otkuda vybivayutsya istochniki, i sredi nikh yest' to, chto rassekayetsya, i ottuda iskhodit voda, sredi nikh yest' to, chto povergayetsya ot strakha pered Allakhom. Allakh ne nebrezhet tem, chto vy delayete
